      • inCircle

        private boolean inCircle​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                         int radius,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int val)
        Checks if given point is inside disk
        Parameters:
        image - BufferedImage object
        radius - disk radius
        x - X axis coordinate of the point to check
        y - Y axis coordinate of the point to check
        val - take 0 or 255 value
        Returns:
        true if point is inside, otherwise false
